title: eMedia Intermediate Guitar Method
description: Learn to play lead guitar and more with eMedia Intermediate Guitar Method! Everything you need to take your playing beyond basic chords and melodies. New techniques are demonstrated in over 170 lessons with full-motion video, variable-speed MIDI, recorded audio and our Animated Fretboard.
